data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meng, Rui, Gnezdilov, Vladimir M., Wang, Yinglun (2015): Two new species of the genus Peltonotellus Puton (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Caliscelidae) from northwestern China with a world checklist. Zootaxa 4052 (4): 465-477, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4052.4.4
